desc: • We are the preeminent organization for planting trees in the Holy Land • Honor the life of those you love with a memorial tree planting. Celebrate life beginnings by planting a tree for the birth of a new baby, or for weddings. We offer the most beautiful certificates of tree plantings...

layout.text: PLANT A TREE IN THE HOLY LAND

WE ARE THE PREEMINENT ORGANIZATION FOR

PLANTING TREES IN THE HOLY LAND
